attributes.action: Restore BBC World Service on 648 medium wave
attributes.additional_details:
While the BBC is ripping the nation off for its license money with rubbish it has stopped broadcasting the World Service on medium wave.  This is bad for Britons at home and abroad and has cost the nation its primary source of international respectability.

Government should require that the BBC restores that service to the nation.  We need medium and long wave radio for French stations etc.
